statements: SELECT * FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, water_usage FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY water_usage ASC;
SELECT location, SUM(water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM WaterConsumptionData GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_water_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water_usage FROM WaterConsumptionData;
SELECT id, location, water_usage, date FROM WaterConsumptionData ORDER BY date DESC, water_usage ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE location = 'New York' AND water_usage > 100 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water_usage, location FROM WaterConsumptionData GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_water_usage DESC
SELECT id, location, date FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY location ASC, date DESC
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM WaterConsumptionData GROUP BY location HAVING total_records > 5 ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE residence_id = 1;
SELECT date, water_consumed FROM historical_data WHERE water_consumed > 100;
SELECT residence_id, SUM(water_consumed) AS total_consumption FROM historical_data GROUP BY residence_id;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT trend_id, trend_description FROM trends_analysis;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE water_consumed > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT trend_description FROM trends_analysis WHERE trend_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT residence_id, SUM(water_consumed) AS total_water_consumed FROM historical_data GROUP BY residence_id HAVING total_water_consumed > 500;
SELECT residence_id, AVG(water_consumed) AS avg_water_consumed FROM historical_data GROUP BY residence_id ORDER BY avg_water_consumed DESC;
SELECT date, residence_id, water_consumed FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY water_consumed DESC, residence_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumptionData;
SELECT id, date, consumption_gallons FROM WaterConsumptionData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT SUM(consumption_gallons) AS total_consumption FROM WaterConsumptionData;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM CustomerInfo WHERE email='example@email.com';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM ConsumptionTrends ORDER BY trend_id LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE consumption_gallons > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerInfo WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM ConsumptionTrends WHERE trend_name = 'Conservation' ORDER BY trend_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM CustomerInfo WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY consumption_gallons DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumptionData;
SELECT Location, Consumption FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE Date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT Name, Address FROM CustomerInfo ORDER BY CustomerID DESC;
SELECT SourceType, Location FROM WaterSources WHERE SourceID = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT Month, Location FROM MonthlyTrends ORDER BY Month ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumptionData ORDER BY Date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Location, Consumption FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE Consumption > 100 ORDER BY Location ASC;
SELECT CustomerID, Name, Address, Email FROM CustomerInfo WHERE CustomerID = 1;
SELECT Location, SUM(Consumption) AS TotalConsumption FROM WaterConsumptionData GROUP BY Location HAVING TotalConsumption > 500 ORDER BY TotalConsumption DESC;
SELECT Month, Location, ConsumptionTrend FROM MonthlyTrends WHERE Month > '2022-01-01' AND Location LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY Month ASC, Location DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_meter_data;
SELECT location_id, city, state FROM location ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM meter_info WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT reading_id, meter_id, reading_date FROM meter_reading_history WHERE reading > 100 ORDER BY reading_date ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, trend_description, trend_start_date, trend_end_date FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY trend_end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM location;
SELECT city, state, country FROM location WHERE state='CA';
SELECT meter_id, consumption, reading_date FROM water_meter_data ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT meter_id, reading, reading_date FROM meter_reading_history WHERE reading > 100 ORDER BY reading ASC;
SELECT meter_id, manufacturer, installation_date FROM meter_info WHERE manufacturer='ABC Company';
